{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[pull]] (usually that is flexible)
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} leave
# to [[tear]]
# to talk [[nonsense]]
# [[ridiculous]], [[crazy]]
# {{lb|zh|dialectal|of weather}} to fall; to have
#: {{zh-x|扯霍閃|to have lightning|M-S|tr=ce3 ho2 san3}}
